game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact and return it to Gandalf the Grey
game.description: Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy base, retrieve the stolen artifact, and deliver it to Gandalf. Stealth and tact are essential in this quest.
